channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: The place for general Runtime chat.

item.title: UE 2 Editor
item.author: invalid@example.com (Norten)
item.dc:creator: Norten
item.content:encoded: Hey im sorry if i missplaced my post but it seems to imposible for me to get UE 2 Editor. I wanna edit one .uax file but i cant find this function in newest UDK. I wanna do it as its explained here http://forum.ragezone.com/f329/help-edit-uax-files-256145/ but i need that UE2 Editor. Is it still possible to get it somewhere for free or do i need to buy some licence? thanks a lot

item.title: A question, like.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ProfessorLemur)
item.dc:creator: ProfessorLemur
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys. So it's my first time here and I'm not quite sure where to place this thread because, like, new.
Basically I'm planning a very basic modification of UT04 which just involves taunts; they're not verbal taunts like "is that your best?", instead they focus around the chat function, much like how the bots communicate with the player over Quake3 Arena, while also having some taunts that are related to their deaths or their kills, so if they die from a headshot via Sniper Rifle, they'll...

A question, like.

item.title: ut2004,ini file reverting to original
item.author: invalid@example.com (ncraiders)
item.dc:creator: ncraiders
item.content:encoded: I had to add two lines to the ut2004.ini file. so i did then I loaded ut2004 and it worked fine but after i shut it down the lines i added were gone. I saved the file after I changed it but it reverted on me does anyone know why it is doing that.

item.dc:creator: scoot
item.content:encoded: Hey, i am currently looking for some one who has used unreal 2 before and successfully created a server out of files that are unreal 2 compatible, please PM me for more details, as this is important.

item.title: Can You Explain How this "Package" is Created/Located?
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheBorg)
item.dc:creator: TheBorg
item.content:encoded:
I am trying to understand how on http://udkc.info/index.php?title=Tutorials:Custom_Weapon/Ranged/4 the author came up with:

Insert the correct path locations for your assets ('Package.group.name'). Mine are located at "Package_1.".

SkeletalMesh=SkeletalMesh'Package_1.WP_FP_SigCommando' // This is your FP Weapon

There is nothing that mentioned "package" on the previous pages of the tutorial. I have been...

Can You Explain How this "Package" is Created/Located?

item.title: Making a Model Active
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheBorg)
item.dc:creator: TheBorg
item.content:encoded:
Just a quick question. I can not seem to find an answer to this one. I made just a plain map. Just a floor really. I inserted the stock model UTVehicleFactory_Manta. All I am trying to do with this one is make the bike thing the active "player." When I run the game to test, I can only move the camera. I have checked settings and such, done some online searches, and unless I am missing the obvious, I can not figure how to make this bike what I move when I run the engine. Can you help me...

Making a Model Active

item.title: What Mod/Mutator was it?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skeptical9)
item.dc:creator: Skeptical9
item.content:encoded: A few years ago, I used to play with a mod/mutator that added a powerup on a random pathnode and when a player got it, it gave him/her shield-belt, amplifier and some other power and it toggled an event and mostly it was that guy against everyone else... and I think it added an halo or something to the one with the powerup. When that godlike player was killed, the powerup was dropped or spawned somewhere else. I don't remember if it was Ut2k4 or Ut99. What was it?

item.title: Is it possible to open .unr files in the editor?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Wowfunhappy)
item.dc:creator: Wowfunhappy
item.content:encoded:
Stupid, noobish question, I know. Sorry, but I've already spent several hours searching Google with no luck. I'm also sorry if I put this in the wrong section- I wasn't sure where this should go.

Whenever I try to open a level in the editor, it will only open .urt files. If I select "all files" and try to open a .unr file, I get an error each time.

Is it possible to open .unr files in the editor? If not, what do I need to open them? I don't mind spending money if necessary, but for...

Is it possible to open .unr files in the editor?

item.title: SwanQuake in animation exhibition
item.author: invalid@example.com (brunomartelli)
item.dc:creator: brunomartelli
item.content:encoded:
Hi
My piece that was made with runtime is in 'Watch Me Move' a big animation exhibition at the Barbican Art Gallery in London - info + pix in the link - ends Sept 11. Also the other exhibition mentioned, VISITOR, has a virtual environment made with UDK.

http://www.igloo.org.uk/NewsLetter/IglooSummerNews2011.html

screenshot:

item.title: Turning speed in differnt environments/Speedbase setting in ini file
item.author: invalid@example.com (suniko)
item.dc:creator: suniko
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I am a newbie to unreal scripting, so sorry if these questions are obviuos to some of you.

I have two very simple environments, and strangely the joystick behaves differently in the two environments. Specifically, the rotation (look left/right) is much faster in one environment than in the other. I tinkered a bit with the User.ini file in the systems folder, where I changed "SpeedBase" in the line

JoyX=Axis aBaseX = SpeedBase=2.0 DeadZone=0.4

This affects the turning speed...

Turning speed in differnt environments/Speedbase setting in ini file

item.title: Virtual Memory Error
item.author: invalid@example.com (brunomartelli)
item.dc:creator: brunomartelli
item.content:encoded:
Hi

- any ideas about this error, my level crashes after about 7 hrs (I need it to run for about 8 realistically! - for an exhibition)

I get a crash box, with "Ran out of Virtual Memory and FMallocWindows: :Malloc etc. "

any ideas?

I have tried setting the VM size - I'm running Win 7 and I've also tried running Runtime in comapatibility mode for Win98 and XP SP3

thanks

item.title: UDK info please
item.author: invalid@example.com (Maws34)
item.dc:creator: Maws34
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone,

alright so a little about me. i am currently a student and im pursueing a degree in game design.
now what interests me most is character modeling.
then today my teacher made it very clear that its hard to get a job in the industry as a character artist.
hence i realised that its a good idea to explore other fields as fall backs.
then someone suggested learning to use the UDK and or UE3?
but then that raised a few questions like
can i import my models and textures...

UDK info please

item.title: Negative Delta Time
item.author: invalid@example.com (qlug)
item.dc:creator: qlug
item.content:encoded:
Can some one please tell me what this means?

-
No Label

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: AuthenticAMD Unknown processor @ 2250 MHz with 2047MB RAM
Video: RADEON X800 Series (6575)

Negative delta time!

History: UGameEngine::Tick <- UpdateWorld <- MainLoop

-

Happens when i start the Unreal2engineruntime..
its acctually an AMD athlon 64 x2 4400+ cpu.
:/

item.title: UnrealEngine2 Runtime. Versions? Downloads?

item.dc:creator: madspacemarinemustdie
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for info about the runtimes of UE2.

So there are/were 2 versions of the UE2 runtime, 22261903 and 22262002, correct? Is there a difference besides stability? Does anyone know where to get the 22262002 version?

TIA

item.title: Some questions?
item.author: invalid@example.com (laerte)
item.dc:creator: laerte
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm new here in the forum of you enjoyed this forum, but I wonder if it is possible to do the following things in unreal engine:

1º is possible to perform any type of game with this powerful tool to play?

example, rpg, tetris, racing, action, adventure, etc.?

2º is possible to make online games like mmorpg?

3º is possible to skin and bones 3ds max and export to the unreal?

4º is possible to leave the camera in 3rd person to show the entire character?...

Some questions?
